Hi all,

in our broad crawl I came across strange issue with robots.txt.

T=
he website http://www.jezise.cz is using robots.txt which contains:

User-a=
gent: *
Allow: /
Disallow: /bible21/
Disallow: /downloads/
Disallow: /stats=
/
Sitemap: http://nasledovnici.jezise.net/sitemap.xml
Sitemap: http://nasle=
dovnici.jezise.net/ucebnice/sitemap.xml

Even though the Heritrix is set to=
 classic robot honouring policy, it
crawls content inside the forbidden dir=
ectories as can be seen from
the log:

2011-04-13T09:15:52.303Z   200      =
  663
http://www.jezise.cz/stats/track.php?mode=3Djs E http://www.jezise.cz=
/
text/javascript #195 20110413091552265+37
sha1:MBPGHNW6I7Z4GXREMWZVLPVVP2=
7NYK6Q - - -

I could not figure out why is this happening and how it can b=
e solved.
Is it possible that this is some bug?

I am using Heritrix 1.15.5=
 on Linux and order.xml is in attachment.

Thank you.

Kind regards,
Adam
